body:
Hallo c:
I'm somewhat new the forums, and the server. You may call me "Fluey"...
I love to play Kohi, as I think I'm "OK" at potion PvP =P
I hope to meet lots of new people; and I can't wait to talk to you friendly people :)
See-you on the battlefield! >:D
